sentences: Aga miks sa siis, armas peremees, võtad pattu teha ja muretsed ihutoiduse eest, hinge aga jätad sootumaks sööti.
Ta on alati muretsed toidu ja vahendite koha peal.
context: The word 'muretsed' in Estonian is an adjective that refers to being concerned with or focused on material things, especially food and basic physical needs rather than spiritual matters. It often carries a slightly negative connotation of being overly preoccupied with worldly possessions or sustenance at the expense of higher concerns.
